alert.note: Alert for North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 22 at 1:30AM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH 11 PM MST FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches possible. Isolated areas could see in excess of 14 inches in elevations above 8000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...North Laramie Range including Garrett and Esterbrook. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST Thursday through 11 PM MST Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
